name: Decorous Harmony
title: Yun Jin: Decorous Harmony

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yun Jin to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Yun Jin, equip this card. After Yun Jin equips this card, immediately use Cliffbreaker's Banner. When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, Flying Cloud Flag Formation will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG. (You must have Yun Jin in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

inPlayDescription: When Yun Jin, who has this card equipped, is on the field, and if you have no cards in your Hand, Flying Cloud Flag Formation will cause your Normal Attack to deal +2 additional DMG.
